synopsis.text: Gyyubid, a witch from the magical realm, finds herself in the world of Chiyoko Kurotori, a fifth-grade occult enthusiast, after an unexpected summoning gone awry due to a stuffed nose. As a result, Chiyoko embarks on a journey to learn the mystical arts under the tutelage of Gyyubid, who claims to be the hottest magic instructor around. Balancing her newfound magical training with her everyday school life proves to be challenging, but with the help of her invisible-to-others mentor, Chiyoko manages to keep her secret safe. The rigorous training and harsh punishments for slacking off test Chiyoko's resolve, but her passion for the occult keeps her determined to master the craft.
